whyMe.span: As a web developer, I bring more than just technical expertise—I bring integrity, precision and a passion for digital solutions. I create websites that don’t just work, but truly inspire. My goal is to deliver projects that users intuitively understand and that help businesses thrive in the digital space.

mySkills.headline: I am currently learning
mySkills.description: Web development is evolving rapidly – and I’m passionate about staying one step ahead. With up-to-date expertise and a keen eye for trends, I create modern, future-proof solutions.
mySkills.descriptionMobile: Web development is evolving rapidly — and I love staying ahead of the curve. Whether it's new tools, emerging trends, or best practices, I continuously expand my knowledge to deliver modern and future-proof solutions to my clients.

about.infoTxt: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe collect coins and bottles to fight against the chickens.

workProcess.infoTxt: Built with vanilla JavaScript, focusing on modular architecture, sprite animation, and collision detection.

whatILearned.infoTxt: Strengthened my understanding of OOP, canvas rendering, and responsive game design.

about.infoTxt: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

workProcess.infoTxt: To ensure clean and maintainable code, I structured the project modularly from the very beginning. The application is divided into well-organized, reusable components, each with a clearly defined responsibility. This structured approach not only enables efficient further development but also facilitates smooth collaboration within the team.

whatILearned.infoTxt: Our team consisted of five people. In each sprint, tasks were distributed so that everyone could work independently on specific components. I was responsible for creating and editing contacts, implementing the application's start animation, and developing the display and editing functionality for tasks. Whenever time allowed, I also contributed to components developed by my teammates — through code reviews, collaborative problem-solving, or minor optimizations. The collaboration was open, solution-oriented, and characterized by mutual support.

references.headline: Need a teamplayer? Here's what my colleagues said about me.

headlineMobile.white: Here's what my colleagues said about me.

calvinHanisch.text: Falko played a key role in our Join project. He handled complex components independently, kept track of how everything fit together, and helped the team stay aligned. Approachable and reliable, he contributed to important decisions, offered guidance in meetings, and ensured teamwork ran efficiently throughout the project.

madinaAskar.text: Falko contributed to key parts of the application, including the contact management and task view features. In later sprints, he developed the start screen and animations, adding an engaging and dynamic user experience. He also supported his teammates with additional frontend sections and authentication features. Falko showed great teamwork, initiative, and a strong willingness to assist others whenever needed.

christopKonst.text: Falko impressed in our group projects with his solid expertise in programming, particularly in JavaScript, TypeScript, and Angular. He consistently worked reliably and demonstrated a high level of responsibility and punctuality. In the Join project, Falko was able to apply his technical skills effectively and played a key role in ensuring the project was successfully implemented and brought to completion.

phillipSchulze.text: Falko K. consistently proved to be a highly committed and responsible team member. He showed great interest in actively contributing to problem-solving and regularly offered constructive suggestions. His reliability regarding agreements and punctuality was exemplary, and he demonstrated an excellent understanding of the tasks at hand. In cases of uncertainty, he always asked proactively, which ensured smooth collaboration and effectively prevented misunderstandings.

contact.headline: Contact me
contact.description: I'm excited about interesting job offers or project inquiries — especially in the field of web development. With creativity, reliability, and a keen eye for detail, I bring real value to any team. Let’s build something great together!

form.privacyTextTwo: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
